channel.title: Banner for my server!
channel.description:
http://puu.sh/3C1In/a072e02877.jpg
Primary Text(Server Name): Tomscape_Beta Secondary Text(Probably a quote, for example "Your search ends here"):Your search ends here Primary Color: pink Secondary color: orange Background or transparent?: background Image for background? (Only if selected background): http://puu.sh/3C1In/a072e02877.jpg Anything else? (eg. Extra images such as Dragon claws):i would like you to put a partyhat on his head (any color) IMPORTANT: Would you like a medium or big banner, if so please give exact pixel size: just use the size with the picture
thanks in advance this is not a troll

Serious requests only please. And by that, I mean an image that is not intended to be used for trolling.

Secondary color: orange

IMPORTANT: Would you like a medium or big banner, if so please give exact pixel size: just use the size with the picture
